title: Sierra Mist
description: Determined and forceful, Jessie Marcus, finds herself embedded within a world full of secrecy and deception. Two men want and need her, one sinister and deceitful, the other mysterious and watchful. Clues quickly unravel revealing something unimaginable and unnatural happening up on Catamount Ridge. The burden falls to her to stop the supernatural forces that threaten her home and family.
author: Aubree Lane
